DOC.brief_summary: The investigator want investigate patient Oculopharyngeal Muscular Dystrophy improve fitness home-training cycle ergometer 30 minute , 3 time week 10 week . Participants evaluate maximal oxygen consumption maximal workload measure incremental test baseline end exercise period .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Aerobic Training Patients With Oculopharyngeal Muscular Dystrophy
DOC.criteria: Danish patient Oculopharyngeal muscular dystrophy Patients week train cycleergometer 10 week Patients health issue wich confound interpretation efficacy .
